## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.BLOCK\_COLLISION" property

Emitted when an entity collides with a block type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.BLOCK_COLLISION]: {
        entity: Entity;
        blockType: BlockType;
        started: boolean;
        colliderHandleA: number;
        colliderHandleB: number;
    };
```
